meta.label: Visual Edit
meta.description: Webapp to edit records of a dataset and maintain an editlog dataset.

params.name: primary_keys
params.label: Primary Keys
params.description:
Columns used to identify a record.

IMPORTANT:
- Make sure that the type and meaning of these columns is set correctly before starting the webapp.
- Reset the editlog if you change the primary keys.

params.name: editable_column_names
params.label: Editable Columns
params.description:
Columns that the webapp user will be able to edit.

IMPORTANT: make sure that the type and meaning of these columns is set correctly before starting the webapp.

params.name: sep-linked-record
params.label: Linked Records
params.description: A linked record (aka foreign key) is an editable column whose values correspond to primary key values of another dataset, referred to as the linked dataset.

params.name: linked_records_count
params.label: How many are there?
params.description: For now this is capped at 2

params.name: linked_record_ds_name_1
params.label: Linked Dataset
params.description: Must be on a SQL connection or contain less than 10,000 records.

params.name: linked_record_key_1
params.label: ↳ Primary Key
params.description: Column used to identify a record.

params.name: linked_record_label_column_1
params.label: ↳ Label
params.description: Column used for display purposes, instead of the primary key.

params.name: linked_record_ds_name_2
params.label: Linked Dataset
params.description: Must be on a SQL connection or contain less than 10,000 records.

params.name: notes_column_required
params.label: Notes
params.description: For end-user notes. Values will be empty by default.

params.name: notes_column_display_name
params.label: ↳ Display name
params.description: Column name used in the webapp interface (underlying storage will use 'notes')

params.name: validation_column_required
params.label: Validation
params.description: To mark rows as validated. Values will be False by default

params.name: validation_column_display_name
params.label: ↳ Display name
params.description: Column name used in the webapp interface (underlying storage will use 'validated')

params.name: show_header_filter
params.label: Show header filters
params.description: Show/hide header filters below each column header

params.name: authorized_users
params.label: Authorized users
params.description: List identifiers of users authorized to view the webapp and make edits, as Strings. Leave empty to give access to anyone who has project-level permission to read dashboards.

params.name: freeze_edits
params.label: Freeze edits
params.description: If set to true, the webapp will not allow any edits to be made.

params.name: editschema
params.label: Editschema (optional)
params.description: Additional column settings to provide as an array of dictionaries in JSON format (example: [ {'name': 'col1'}, {'name': 'col2'} ]
